localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
nodes.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics
nodes.author: Stefania Olafsdottir

nodes.excerpt: Kafkai is a machine-learning algorithm writes articles from scratch. There is no scraping or spinning happening in the background. It allows you to get unique content for cents instead of dollars. It's perfect for bulk content production that SEOs require.
nodes.title: Kafkai 2.0 - Unique and readable content generated by AI
nodes.author: Dejan Murko

nodes.excerpt: Vidjet is a smart video player for websites. It uses a popup format to display videos, so you can segment and trigger them to your visitors. â € It's also the easiest and fastest way to publish videos on a website! ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: The priorities of workers are shifting. Unito compiled this toolkit to help kickstart your companyâ€™s growth in four important areas: remote work and flexible scheduling, diversity and inclusion, career growth and compensation, transparency and alignment.
nodes.title: The Better Workplace Toolkit  - Resources to help you meet the evolving needs of your team

nodes.excerpt: Around is a lightweight video collaboration tool that floats on your desktop, perfect for things like design sessions, brainstorms, and code reviews. Available for download. Now comes with EchoTerminator.
nodes.title: Around 2.0 - Video calls for the future of hybrid-remote work
nodes.author: Garry Tan

nodes.excerpt: 9 months after we initially launched on Chrome, Motion Firefox is finally here! Motion is an all-in-one time management tool that helps you get things done: by helping you maximize focus time, group meetings together, easily send availabilities, and focus.
nodes.title: Motion Firefox - All-in-one time management tool in Firefox

nodes.excerpt: Get yourself comfortable, turn your phone so the flashlight is facing you, close your eyes then fall effortlessly into an immersive journey through a kaleidoscope of colours created by your subconscious...
nodes.title: Lumenate - Effortlessly explore your subconscious

nodes.title: pNeura - Entrepreneurs Network - EXPLORE STARTUPS AND FOUNDERS
nodes.author: Michelle Badenhorst

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
nodes.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals

nodes.excerpt: TeamTime is the simplest, most streamlined and secure time logging tool (mobile & web) designed specifically for https://basecamp.com users. We created it for https://www.clearbluedesign.com/ourselves after struggling with other tools out there. We share it with you.
nodes.title: TeamTime for Basecamp - Time tracking for teams using Basecamp

nodes.excerpt: Who you follow is one of the most important aspects of the Clubhouse app. The Rooms that are shown to users are based on which people and Clubs you choose to follow. I compiled a list of 200 most influential people to follow on Clubhouse.
nodes.title: People of Clubhouse - Most influential people on Clubhouse
